price: (196) Be not deceived by the [uninhibited] movement of the disbelievers throughout the land.
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
